Haste
[i]Audhulma[/i] – Other creatures you control have haste and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
[i]Tempest Rising[/i] – Whenever Joshua, Tempest King attacks for the first time each turn, exile the top three cards of your library. Target opponent chooses a nonland card exiled this way. You may cast that card this turn without paying its mana cost. Put the rest into your hand.
